summary: Kinematic ENB Southern Light has to be thought as vanilla with ENB Series full effects and a highly cinematic approach. Retained colours, slight cinematic grain, anamorphic flares, sunsprites, starbust and genuine SSAO-SSIL and high quality Depth of Field.
descriptionHtml:
[center][font=century gothic][color=lightgreen][b][size=+3]Kinematic ENB ' Southern Light '[/size][/b][/color]

[size=+1][color=YELLOW][font=century gothic]ALL

K ENB setups development for Skyrim 32 bits version has stopped.

I'm actually working on porting my setups to the Skyrim SE, because 64bits are better for everything.

The SE ENB binary development just began, so please people be patient. I'll be developping step by step.

Last thing, thank you all for your support, many thanx to the few who helped development with the few donations I got. And yes, supporting modders is important, since it gives us more time to deliver the mods you deserve.

Best to all of you
K[/color][/size][/font]

[img]https://farm6.staticflickr.com/5504/12677808624_1259680d3e_c.jpg[/img]

::
[size=+1]Kinematic ENB Southern Light is also featured on [url=http://deadendthrills.com/forum/discussion/75/enb-preset-kyo-s-tesv-skyrim-enbs/p1]Dead End Thrills[/url]
This is the place where I'll publish experimental things, progresses, pre-updates. Please do visit the K ENB official forum there for test downloads, screenshots, feedbacks, and support.

And while you're at it, be sure to pay a visit to [url=http://deadendthrills.com]Dead End Thrills[/url] general thread to enjoy
pure games-related art ![/size]
::

[size=+1]Please do check my other setups :
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/58534]Kountervibe ENB Northern Light[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/58338]K ENB Pure Light[/url][/size]

::

[size=+1][color=YELLOW]If you like and use my works, please consider making a donation via the "donate" button up there, to support the Pure Light project. I actually do need it to help me with my development processes.[/color][/size]

::

[img]https://farm6.staticflickr.com/5534/12677209225_918ede95a5_c.jpg[/img]

::
[color=YELLOW][u][b][size=+1][url=http://enbdev.com/mod_tesskyrim_v0272.htm]Please download the ENB 0.272 binary first[/url][/b][/u][/color][/size]
::
[center][youtube]hcZeLINETMg[/youtube][/center]    
                      
[size=+1][b]Vid courtesy of [url=http://www.youtube.com/user/hodilton?feature=watch]Hodilton[/url][/b][/size]
::

[size=+1][b]Screenshots by [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/6207920]siuan[/url][/b][/size]
[size=+1][b]Please visit [url=https://www.flickr.com/photos/erikatschinkel/sets/]her Flickr Gallery[/url][/b][/size]

[img]https://farm9.staticflickr.com/8591/16367081310_15ffdc6aec_c.jpg[/img]
[img]https://farm8.staticflickr.com/7422/15932003304_58f04f5d44_c.jpg[/img]
[img]https://farm9.staticflickr.com/8620/15931908574_49f11a1134_c.jpg[/img]
[img]https://farm8.staticflickr.com/7376/16368221709_6f577098c5_c.jpg[/img]
[img]https://farm8.staticflickr.com/7287/16743851082_826828b34e_c.jpg[/img]

::

[img]https://farm3.staticflickr.com/2873/12677566754_60a1c33b74_c.jpg[/img]
[color=YELLOW][u][b][size=+2]Purposes[/size][/b][/u][/color][/font]
[font=verdana]Kinematic ENB Southern Light aims at retaining the original vanilla game colour range while using ENB Series full effects for a fully cinematic experience.
It's built for * quality *, gaming AND screenarchery.
Boris Vorontsov gave us the tools, each of us tweakers uses them for its own purposes.
Performance is matter of the way the game, the mods, the inis, your rig are interacting.
ENB can't solve ALL performance issues, and it won't.
Eye candy comes at a price, and it's a natural rule.
Please do remember that any ENB preset will always remain a WIP.
[/font]

[img]https://farm8.staticflickr.com/7435/12677325644_107a250b29_c.jpg[/img]

[font=century gothic][color=YELLOW][u][b][size=+2]Who am I and how will I support this preset ?[/size][/b][/u][/color][/font]
[font=verdana]I'm a 45 years old french divorcee with 4 kids I'm raising alone.
I'm writing it to clearly explain why I can't promise that I'll support my preset here night and day.
Actually, I won't. You need to help yourself before asking anything here.
I'm a gamer above all things, then a tweaker, then an amateur screenarcher, then a noob coder.
But please do remember I'm a father and real life matters first.[/font]

[img]https://farm9.staticflickr.com/8714/16944602821_e6e06ba748_c.jpg[/img]
[img]https://farm8.staticflickr.com/7295/12676970505_133ac2466e_c.jpg[/img]

[font=century gothic][color=YELLOW][u][b][size=+2]What will I answer and what will I ignore ?[/size][/b][/u][/color][/font]
[font=verdana]I'll answer all specific troubleshooting about the mod, assuming the facts you read this page and you dared visiting enbdev.com.
I'll totally ignore :
All that's already been covered in this page, a/o several times in the comments section.
Comments about the description page, myself, other ENB presets, other mods.
Strictly tastes-related comments, to each his own.
Tweaking advices, I'm no one to teach.
Weather modifiers of Lighting modifiers compatibility issues.
Basic trolling, since I'll simply enjoy it without wasting my time.[/font]

::

[font=century gothic][color=YELLOW][u][b][size=+2]BASIC DISCLAIMER[/size][/b][/u][/color][/font]
[font=verdana][size=+1]Kinematic ENB Southern Light is a demanding preset and it will remain this way.[/size]
::
[size=+1]Kinematic ENB Southern Light is NOT MEANT to be used with Climates of Tamriel, Realistic Lighting Overhaul or 
ANY other weather, imagespace modifier.
It's * technically * compatible, but it'll look weird if used with these.[/size]

::

[color=YELLOW][u][b][size=+2]FEATURES[/size][/b][/u][/color][/font]
[font=verdana]Genuine Complex SSAO and Complex Indirect Lighting
SMAA SubPixel Morphological Anti Aliasing, SweetFX integrated
Boulotaur's SweetFX Version
High detailled Shadows and Sunrays effects
Starbust, Crazy Flares, Chapman Pseudo Lens Flare, courtesy of Kingeric1992
SkyLighting
Highly reworked enbbloom.fx, enbeffect.fx, enblens.fx and enbeffectprepass.fx Codes
All codes are D-N-I separated and are featuring timer-related dynamics
Extensive Sunsprite Shaders
Sunsprite textures courtesy of --JawZ--
Anamorphic Lenz Flare, courtesy of Matso
Extensively modified Tilt-Shift DOF, courtesy of gp65cj04 and Kingeric1992
SweetFX shaders, courtesy of CeeJay.dk and Boulotaur
Colour correction toggling functions, separation and enhancements, based off JawZ's initial DNI separation and further extended
Included Optional SkyBox
Optional quality presets[/font]

[img]https://farm4.staticflickr.com/3849/14477430421_7d48acf4d9_c.jpg[/img]

[font=century gothic][color=YELLOW][u][b][size=+2]BASIC INSTALLATION PROCESS[/size][/b][/u][/color][/font]
[font=verdana]Don't use Mods managers to install Kinematic ENB Southern Light, it can't work since NMM installs files in Skyrim's Data folder, not in main folder.
Copy the folder's contents to their correct destinations :
All files should go to your Skyrim Main folder, where the TESV.exe is located

Disable any Game-based or Driver-based antialiasing method, any Anisotropic Filter from game AND from drivers

ADD THESE LINES TO SkyrimPrefs.ini, [Display] section :
bFloatPointRenderTarget=1
bTreesReceiveShadows=1
bDrawLandShadows=1
bShadowsOnGrass=1

SET YOUR RESOLUTION IN THE FILES :
enbeffectprepass.fx
enbsunsprite.fx

In both, where you'll spot :
#define fWidth 1920.0
#define fHeight 1080.0

Just replace the scales with yours. f.e. , for 1920x1200 :
#define fWidth 1920.0
#define fHeight 1200.0

Save the file. Done.

This step is important, since some effects are indexed upon texels.

Please DO calibrate your monitor
Try to avoid any light source too close to your display

Kinematic ENB Southern Light has been designed using the wrapper version

Back up the following:
The current SweetFX files you're using. Replace them all : my SweetFX shaders are modified
The current ENB you're using if currently using one
Your game inis, located in MyDocuments/MyGames/SKyrim
Your game saves
Back up your sun textures, located in Skyrim/Data/textures/sky
When using the mods I'm highly advicing, back up your sky textures as well[/font]

[img]https://farm9.staticflickr.com/8524/8611338268_5ccd6e8639_c.jpg[/img]
